1.) Who are the Enemies in red ?
\t\t\t Red Enemies are enemies of less strength and Cave Man can kill them with the axe(Cave Man Weapon).
2.) Who are the Enemies in black ?
\t\t\t Black Enemies are enemies of more strength and Cave Man is not able to kill them with the axe.
3.) How to play game ?

\t\t\t The game is simple and above the FAQs given a demo video of playing the game. Firstly player need to select the game level, and then he will be directed to the corresponding level. Now the axe is with CAVE MAN sitting on the tree, and with the use of axe, he need to kill the enemies in red. The player need to touch the top of caveman and drag the axe towards the enemies coming from right side, and as the axe touches the Red Enemies, they got killed and score increases respectively. The axe just pass through the Black Enemies without killing them. As the first enemy touches the left of the game screen, the GAME OVER! message will be displayed indicating that level is over.
4.) Where is the Level Score visible ?
\t\t\t The Level Score is visible at the top left corner for each level.
5.) How much points does player gets on killing each Red Enemy ?
\t\t\t Killing each Red Enemy gives player 10 extra points.
6.) What to do when particular level finishes?

\t\t\t The message of GAME OVER! will be visible on screen when particular level finishes, If player want to play next level, need to touch anywhere on the screen. Otherwise pressing the back key and player will be directed to the MENU page.
